ana šarri bēlīya urdaka Nabu-duru-uṣur lū šulmu ana šarri bēlīya šulmu ana Deri šulmu ana bīrti x x x x x x x x ša-qurbūte x x x x x ina pānīya x x x x x x x x {1}{d}x x x x x x x x x+x x x x x x x x x x+x x x x x x x x x x ku x x x x x x x x x+x ša x x x x x x x x x x ma x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x+x x x x x-zu-u₂ ša-rēšāni x x x x ina muhhīni šarru x x x x-ik ūme lišpurru x x x x x ina marṣi li-iš-x x x x Deri lilliku x x x x šarru bēlī issi {LU₂}x x x x x-ni lillikūni issi šarri bēlīya lidbub x x x Deri issi šarri x x x x 05 mar-Babili x x x x illû x x x x+x mar-Babili x x x unqu šarri x x x
